lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role! Where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around, play Dungeons and Dragons, and shout obscenities a little late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out, I'm sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, this week, for the five members that we do have, we are going to have a fantastical Battle Royale. A Level 17 Battle Royale. The power level has definitely jumped since the last time we had one of these, I'm curious to see how it pans out. Should be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, I saw voting-- there was a poll to see who they thought would win.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold off on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder how many people are going to lose money on us tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis, you have something-- yes, right, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where? Right here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, right there. There's a little something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I get it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because I apparently don't like having weekends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you allergic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need to work on that. Planning is a problem, it catches up to you. But anyway, I'll be out there for that in Dallas, Texas. Hope to see you guys that weekend. What else? What else do people want to talk about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to have our Wednesday Club this Wednesday. I think we're going to do Wonder Woman. We were having a straw poll, where I think we're going to be talking about Wonder Woman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's kind of irrelevant right now, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we don't normally veer relevant, but we figure this is kind of a big deal so, you know, and it's an interesting conversation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you ever done an episode about Groo the Wanderer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but I know of Groo. We don't know Groo well enough to really delve in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you do an episode on Groo, that's the one I'll watch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not the one you'll be on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no. I'll watch it, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll watch it, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I'm not going to go on your show.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could bring my comic collection on your show! And show it off!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have a comic collection?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More than ten? More than ten comics?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I've got some good books, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You gave me that really good comic book for-- was it Christmas last year? Or the year before, because I read it in Colorado, it was really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Save your rolls, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had to test it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I know you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the Joe-dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! There you go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's making it into the battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. You need to know who's in your corner, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, keep in mind, whatever alliances or betrayals you endure that first round will probably be remembered for the second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait! Were we supposed to make alliances?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all four of us against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, raise your hand if you're on Team Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Table Right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, have you played Risk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Risk is a game where you make alliances and then double-cross people. It doesn't say it in the rules, but that's how it always happens. That's what I assume will probably happen. It may not! You guys may surprise me! I'm just saying, be prepared.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Be prepared!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay, now I'm voting for that table! All right, guys, the other thing I want to mention is, whoever the victor is will get a minor prize. A very, very minor prize.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?! Do we get to know what it is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A Nintendo Switch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a single reroll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could come in handy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a Luck point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well fuck! No! My lighthearted self is now changed!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You already have fate dice! You have a fucking Deck of Many Things. You have an entire plethora of fate dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is not the same. There's like a seven percent chance I even pull something even close to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm with Travis on this one. It's just not the same. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big prize!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Enjoy the fate die, Keyleth or Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like when you choose to become a goldfish from a thousand feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that would have been great. To have then. Mm-hm. So clutch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then it'll be other people who somehow have all their hit points in Round Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's happening, guys. You're going to forget I existed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mr. Loot-Drop over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Loot-Drop may go down early.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mr. Care-Package.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all comfortably find yourself resting, falling into sleep and darkness for the evening, in the city of Whitestone, over some point in the break of the year-long period. You find yourself-- Your eyes opening; bleary, blinking, towards what appears to be a grey cloud-covered sky. You look about and find yourselves somewhat scattered amongst an unfamiliar battlefield. Travis, I want you to go ahead and roll a d6 for me, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh God. Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is serious! This is serious!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A two. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God! I was just looking at the top-view, I didn't realize that those are fucking towers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so that's you there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura. Go ahead and roll a d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (panting) Okay! Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A six! With Trinket there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh God. Oh, with Trinket up there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly where the ranger should be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Marisha, roll a d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First roll of the night!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four. All righty. Taliesin?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at us, spreading out our numbers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so as you take in the scenery around you, seemingly no rhyme or reason. You wonder how you transported to this space. Taryon in particular, you find that you seem to be a little more viable power than you were when you went to bed that night. You watch as a singular cloaked figure seems to emerge from the clouds above you and slowly fall from the sky. As the entity, you see arms out, hood up, the wind blowing around causing the cloth to flap and curl about them. The hood blows back, and you see before you, a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey everybody, I can fly 200,000 feet in one second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you will dance before me. And between you all, one victor shall stand and gain my "blessing." At which point, he raises his hand, and you watch as a force field of energy suddenly (whoosh) warps around and encapsulates around it, also zeroing off the top about there. So there is a height limit to this chamber. Right across there. About 20 feet up from the base of this tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which are 30 feet tall, 20 feet tall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are 30 feet tall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So about 50 feet up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 feet up, yeah. You watch as he grins and smiles. "I hope you all learn something. Now, you "have six seconds to decide where to go and what to prepare for. No fighting is to commence until "these six seconds are up. And then... Show me what you've got!" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, we can cast things in these six seconds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cast or prepare anything you want to, an action or movement or bonus, that doesn't attack or assault another person, for the first round, but first! Let's roll initiative, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm feeling lucky? That's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's one Luck down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, 25 to 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ain't gonna have a repeat of last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. (laughs) That's right, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just low enough, if I had been above Liam, that would have been the end of him, but he hid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need a tie breaker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think so. I'll have you guys both roll dexterity checks for me, please. Just roll a d20--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just normal dex rolls? Or just straight up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a d20, and add your dex modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we have Vex, then Grog-Keyleth! All righty, and then Tary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Which, by the way, you also have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty at your disposal at the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you at the top of the tower too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on that tower. She's on the other tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute, here's my question. Did we see where everybody landed? Could we see everybody, when we came down? Or did we just see the guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just saw the guy, and you just got your vision around, so this round is going to be running and taking in your surroundings, and doing what you're going to do to prepare. From where you are right now, you can barely see somebody. We'll say as part of this round, you guys get a feel for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As part of this round we what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a feel for where everyone else is, as part of this first round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the towers, on the far ends of the map, is there a back entrance to the tower, or just the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the doors there, or climbing upward, and there appears to be a trapdoor on either side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Going up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a ladder, ladder, and a chain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When he said you have six seconds, I immediately duck down and cast Pass Without a Trace on myself and Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, we'll get to your turn; Percival, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to activate the Boots of Spider Climbing. Should knock that out. I'm going to charge Diplomacy. And then I'm going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, is that a rule?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm just talking shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I ain't hiding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hiding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to climb up to the top of that building that's right over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one? This one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That little hut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you climb up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a hut, is that what those are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're little stone bunker-like structures. There's an entrance on this side and on this side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, how far-- I have a-- (counting) six, one, two, three, four, five--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a paintball arena.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, it's half your movement, that's 15 feet, you can move 15 more feet if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let me get just one step back or so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still at the edge, on the other side, though. To your right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, here? Okay. So there you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and boots are activated, Diplomacy is activated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. All right. Just after Percy goes, you watch as all the flickering braziers, the flames flicker bright. You see these two glowing towers that are slowly spinning, the blue crystals (crackling noises) little sparks. And each of these pillars gives off a slight hum. Vex, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a trapped thing? This is so Hunger Games. Oh shit! Okay. I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on me and Trinket. And I'm going to send him down-- Is there a trapdoor or like a stairway around? That he can go down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a trapdoor that he can go down and then make his way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to make his way down. But I am going to hide, at the top here, behind one of those--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind one of those? Okay. Go ahead and make a stealth check. And Trinket makes it-- We'll say halfway down the tunnel with Trinket's full movement, there. So down the stairs and he's halfway through the tower there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So my stealth is 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. Nobody else has any idea where you are right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment. All right, that brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to stick with the Bloodaxe. Not the Dwarven Thrower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Bloodaxe. Oof.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I know. That might be a poor choice. Oh, you motherfuckers can fly!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dwarven Thrower, and can I start to climb the little rope ladder that's next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can, make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to get a good lay of the land! I don't even know anybody's up there! 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The glasses are clutch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rage, get up, and just crest over the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, you're already there!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming) He sleeps in war paint?! Why would he sleep in war paint?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rage-climbs the ladder. One rung over the other, and with the rest of his movement gets to the very top of the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your bonus action was rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's right, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have an action you want to do that doesn't involve attacking or hurting anybody--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I blow a snot rocket when I get to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as a large globule of goliath snot slaps the ground in front of you, and skids a bit, leaving a trail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dexterity check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Is that your turn, Grog? Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, god. It begins. Can I just run up, and just check that water right in front of me? And really fast, put my foot in it and see if I can see how deep it goes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, let her do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me take my staff. And just put my staff down a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Your staff dips down and it goes about-- It keeps going. It's pretty deep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty deep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the point where you get, like, to the very edge of your staff, holding it there, and it manages to go all the way in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I touch the bottom now, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well, you haven't felt the bottom yet, any more and you're going to submerge your hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast Freedom of Movement on myself. And then can I move around to this side, here-ish? This side here-ish. Over here. And hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And move over this way? Well, you're not hiding, you don't have anything left to do a hide action, but you move there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. So, Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone else has gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a lot to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Number one, how much does Doty weigh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At his size, I'd say he weighs somewhere in the range of 700 pounds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck. That changes things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is somewhat hollow in places, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Build him out of aluminium?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still, anything over 400 bones my strategy so it's okay. We're okay. Plan number two. Okay. I say, Doty! I need you to carry me away from all the bad people. Remember how we played keep-away as children? We're playing that now. Keep me away from everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I cast Sanctuary on Doty. I think I can do that. Yeah? Okay. And then for my action I will throw down the Bead of Force on myself and enclose myself in the bubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to be a guy in a hamster ball being carried around by robot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take 5d4 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty smart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You take 5d4 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just putting yourself in the ball?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's smart, you know what? And then we can't hurt you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got ten rounds, y'all. See ya!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it totally invulnerable type of shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless somebody can dispel it or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only breathable air can pass through the sphere's wall. No attack or other effect can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says no magic can pass within or without the space, it doesn't say that I can't do magic in the sphere, it just says it can't leave the sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So you can cast things on yourself within, but nothing can pass by. However, you are at the mercy of whoever has control of the ball at the moment. So yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, but you can't cast spells out either?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ever see those sporting events where the beach ball's just going around the fucking crowd?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait. Only air can pass through it, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Breathable air. Not poison air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I was an air elemental, could I go into the sphere? Just conjecturing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know if you're considered breathable as an air elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. But I'm a breath of fresh air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon, as you slam into the ground, how much damage do you take?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll roll. Six, seven, eight. Nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not too bad. You take nine points of damage, and the sphere encapsulates you and you begin to roll forward slightly as Doty walks over, grabs you, and pulls you back about there to the edge. Not sure what to do, he's just holding you now in this ball.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who can I see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can barely see part of Grog with three-quarters cover. Barely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can barely see Grog with three-quarters cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else looks apparently at the moment not really in your line of sight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's just take a couple shots at Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, if you hadn't made it all the way up that tower you'd be in intense trouble right now. Okay, just pointing that out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have Sharpshooter, so you ignore three-quarters cover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I ignore three-quarters-- Let's do first shot with Animus. That's a 29 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits? All right. Let's just roll all three first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! No. And then the second one is a misfire.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, gun-break misfire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gun-break misfire. It's gun-break misfire. That's okay. Yeah, so I'll just take my third shot with Bad News. Just for fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. All right, so-- One Animus shot, and then one Bad News shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One Animus shot, one Bad News shot. And I also take, really quickly, I take a little damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 2d6 psychic, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's roll. I'm also going to run some Cabal's Ruin into this, just for fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, let's do the first one, is 1d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, do Cabal's Ruin damage at the end because that is not halved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. So, 1d10 plus 1d6. So, first shot is ten points of piercing damage and four points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of piercing damage, so that's reduced to five. And then how many points of psychic? Four points of psychic. Seven points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then, the Bad News is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait. Ten points-- it's nine. It was ten points piercing reduced to five and then four psychic. So that's nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, and the psychic's not reduced, that's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, that's cocked. That's seven, eight, nine, ten, 11. 17 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so take that down to eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And let's just-- three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine. This is not halved, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The psychic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this is Cabal's Ruin. He's pumping you full of lightning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to empty Cabal's Ruin into him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! That's how many d6s?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 10d6 lightning damage to you, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ones!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all threes and fours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so nervous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 33 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right, Percival, and you have movement. And a bonus, if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to blow my bonus for now, but I am going to run down and across towards that tower towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? That's 30 right there, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's like six cameras in front of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As far that way as I can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. All right, so, end of Percival's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Oh! Are there lair actions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are lair actions on this battlefield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a door, by the way, in that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a door right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'll eventually be heading towards that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, as you're running by it, Percival, you hear that low hum (humming) begins to (humming intensifies). Spin up, you hear this crackling noise. And you watch as each of these four towers suddenly gives off this intense vibration around it. As you're walking, you feel this force pulling on you, like being within a certain radius of this is forcing you to move slower (grunting). That's all. Vex, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I can see Grog as well, because I'm assuming his head is above those parapets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. He does have half-cover from you currently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have Sharpshooter, so he does not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send Trinket down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Trinket does manage to get all the way to the bottom and emerges from the front door there, but that's as far as Trinket can get with his movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's like (confused bear sound).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you concerned with the love of your life running across the courtyard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't see him! He's hidden, like from my field of view, I'm assuming I can't really see him. Can I see Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy? Yeah, you can see Percy from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to still shoot Grog. Yeah, I'm going to shoot Grog twice. Once with the Blazing Bowstring, and we're just going to see how that goes. Aww man! 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is my AC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it hits! Yes! Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not too hard to hit me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've just got a billion hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15. 15 plus four lightning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, halved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, lightning damage is halved?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hm, I have resistance to lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do when you go into your large form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, which I'm not, yet! So 15 halved is eight, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and then four lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is why you didn't halve any of the Cabal Ruin damage last round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then five points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, he gets half piercing damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! Okay, I'm going to try it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that's an 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 halved is seven. No, wait. Eight, because it's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus four lightning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus Blazing Bowstring. Seven points of fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to use my bonus action. I'm going to move down a couple parapets towards you and I'm going to keep hiding as my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to roll if I've got skirmisher stealth? Or do I just continue to hide? I'm just wondering how that works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a while since you used skirmisher stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I don't remember. Yeah, it's a ranger thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This fight started and I'm like (machine gun fire). The fucking Godfather just (screaming).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically. You're not wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hit you with a ball of lightning, man, like a Tesla coil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I climb up to the top of the tower like, what's going on? (machine gun fire)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the start of your turn, you pick a creature to remain hidden from, not a general hiding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so I could say, I'm keeping hidden from Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. But everybody else can still see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I would roll for stealth to hide from everybody else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to make the hide action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep hidden from Percy for skirmisher stealth, and then I'm going to roll for stealth, and I got a 24 to hide from everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. Now, you guys are aware she's there, you just cannot shoot her or attack her from this distance necessarily. All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Mr. Pincushion. What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the Titanstone Knuckles and I smash them together and I cast Enlarge on myself. Is Doty up there with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sure. He's holding me in a ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this tee-time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go into a frenzied rage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And can I try and shove Doty off of the top of the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll have to succeed a wisdom saving throw, first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My wisdom ain't bad. My intelligence is dick-all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. So you go to shove him, and you go (groan).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, because he's got Sanctuary on himself!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what Earthbreaker Groon had!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That's what Earthbreaker Groon did to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can still make the attack, you just have to point it at someone else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Interesting. I choose to urinate all over-- no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the ball count as someone else, or just Doty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can attack the ball, but it does nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it'll throw me away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Interesting, interesting. I don't learn lessons very well. I'm going to try again. One more time. I get three attacks, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going to do the second shove attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that's it. DC 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a shove attack, I believe it's a contested athletics check, let me double-check real fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Not strength, but athletics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty sure. I'm sure the Internet right now is going, "No, it's this! God damn it, Mercer!" No, it's athletics contested by athletics, so go ahead and roll an athletics check, Grog. With advantage, because you're raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20, add four. For Doty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Goofy-style screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Doty turns to Grog, goes, "Tary?" (bang) and end over end gets shoved off the parapet, slamming onto the ground, prone here at the bottom of the chain. You, Taryon, fly off (boing) harmlessly and roll into the middle of the pool, and are currently now on your side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Floating? Is it like at Ren Faire? I'm in one of those balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the 30-foot fall, Doty takes 11 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still alive, he's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is prone. (chuckles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have some movement left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have 40 feet of movement left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Is there a trap door at the top of the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would I need an action or a bonus to be able to open it? To go down into it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be an action to lift it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it's not that much, because it's not locked or anything. You can probably just pull it open.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'd like to go into the tower stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, with the rest of your movement, 40 feet, you can get almost to the bottom, so you're partway through that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm still inside, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're still inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. As long as no one can... yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth. Your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking hamster ball piece of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might be alive for a long time after you're all dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's kind of true. Ten rounds, that's a long fucking time. Okay, question. The radius of the (energy field sound effect). I have Freedom of Movement, do I seem to not be affected by that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it there, and as you push forward a little bit with your hand, it doesn't seem to be-- the gravitational shift isn't affecting you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to move up and forward this direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, one, two, three, stop right there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there on the edge?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Doty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Taryon in the middle, and you see Percival right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like the idea of seeing Tary like...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can move one more square, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move three more squares if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The inside of the ball is all puke smeared everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Move me up to the doorway, up one more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can look inside now. You see a small chamber, and what appears to be a small chest against the wall there, and this area is just an open space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck, is there loot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You shut your damn mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm up top?! Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a beacon. It's a very nice beacon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do have a beacon. I have a feeling that beacon is going to attack us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably going to attack us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! It's so benignly designed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to, on top of Doty, cast a 5th-level Flaming Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay! (boom) So, you watch as, suddenly, spiraling out of the air, this swirl of fire forms into a large, burning ball of flame that begins to collide and burn and singe into Doty's (squealing metal) prone form on the ground, still reeling from the impact of being knocked off the tower. That's 5d6 damage. Go ahead and roll a dexterity saving throw for Doty. I think it's dexterity, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Prone doesn't change your dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a 16, plus dexterity of zero. So 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not make her DC, unfortunately. So that's 5d6 points of fire damage against Doty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't get any other bonuses, okay. I'm going to say, sorry, Tary! And then go (whoosh) and go fire elemental form, and hope that this isn't a mistake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be nothing but black powder in the chest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wouldn't hurt me none.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just, "Tary?" (explosion) Just a white flash like Akira opening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do any more movement with my elemental form?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? You had ten feet of movement left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pop into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll say, boom, boom. There you go. So you flicker inside and you are currently contained on the inside there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, with the roof on there and everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are floating in a sphere over a pool of murky green liquid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: End of round one. Okay. Action: Prep my healing draught. Just pour it into a bottle and get it ready to rock. Bonus: Click my Boots of Speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boots of Speed, clicked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Movement: (rapid vibration sound effect)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Sonic the Hedgehog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my Boots of Speed on, and the feat that I took, I've got 80 feet of movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you ever run in one of those balls on the water? They don't go anywhere, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shh. It's shooting water everywhere, it's spraying it on Keyleth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, the sphere is half your movement to push it, so you get to push it 40 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm also in water, and I don't know if it has any friction or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, on the water, you get about that far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, I moved!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (straining sound) It's splashing behind, the ball's coasting, and you're almost three, two feet from the edge of the rock, and you're like, "Oh God! Oh God!" The sweat's starting to pour from your brow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're vomiting inside the sphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like the worst spin art ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Throwing up the wine you drank earlier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And what's Doty going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think sound can escape, so he's going to keep doing what I told him to do. Get to me, and keep me away from other people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trapped inside the sphere, it doesn't say anything about it making silence or blocking sound, so you can still communicate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does Sanctuary stay on Doty now, or does it go away when I hit him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sanctuary, once you get an attack--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It lasts a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts a minute until--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't say if he gets hit it ends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's until the creature attacks. Yes, until the warded creature takes an attack. So right now, it still has Sanctuary on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but if he attacks he'll lose it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to tell him to do that. Get to me and get me away from other people. This is a suicide mission for Doty, guys, this is not going to end well for him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doty's not going to win this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a valid point and reminder. It probably will be fine, but Keyleth, I should've remembered, because he did have Sanctuary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's okay, because hers was an area of effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it wasn't. You target it to ram into something. It wasn't a Fireball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to make a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw. Because it says "target with a harmful spell." So, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got crazy high wisdom. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. I just wanted to double check on that, because I totally forgot about the Sanctuary. But still warded with Sanctuary, getting up, half movement, so Doty has 20 more feet to move, I think. Speed of 40. What do you want Doty to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get to me and push me away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Doty's going to move five--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he not affected by the gravity thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty's like (clanging metal) "Tary!" A ball of flames just slamming into the back. All right. I think that ends your turn, Taryon. Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to dive into that room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Five, ten, 15, 20. Your movement's halved, it's like rough terrain, essentially, as you're moving forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I've got two more movement? Two more bits of movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more. But now as you get into the doorway, it's not affecting you anymore. You do see a small chest in the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go over to the chest. I'm going to try and fix my gun really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so make an action to try and repair it real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. Had to roll a nine, I got a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. So you repair Animus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I can't open the chest as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to do that, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm just going to hide and wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So there you are. You are inside of that chamber. Perfect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Explosions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The large pillars that were humming diminish. The slowly shifting blue, crackling towers at the top of each large tower begin to spin faster, and you hear (crackling) and bursts of electrical energy just (static) out of each side. Everyone on the tower, which would just be you, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you celebrating that I'm getting hurt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You dick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited that I don't have to be the one to kill you. I don't want to be the one to kill you. I'll never live that down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you succeed. It would be 16 points of lightning damage, it's reduced to eight. So you take eight points of lightning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then as the bolt subsides, the towers slowly spin back down and appear to have gone dormant once more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a great map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This has been fun so far. You guys just barely got into it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Call of Duty needs to copy this map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Who can I see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Doty. You can see Taryon. You watched Keyleth turn into the fire elemental and disappear into this chamber. And you watched Percy run into this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the roofs of the chambers are stone, wood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're stone. Five feet of stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't give suggestions, can we, over the earpiece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you want to. You guys are welcome to communicate between each other for this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On your turn!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shit. Damn it. Fuck, I had such a good thing to do!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket runs up (heavy footsteps) (growl) and shoves you, and you spin back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just gentle enough to put him right in the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a strength check, because this is pushing against Taryon's wound-up, Sonic the Hedgehog, gotta-go-fast speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Okay, make a strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you get pushed back right into the center of the water there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the Overwatch map I've been waiting for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then, I'll tell you what. Was that an attack for Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that was Trinket's attack. It was a shove attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to save my action until somebody outside of Tary or Doty becomes visible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Vex. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll remedy that shit. Can I rage-tiptoe up to the doorway at the bottom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you (ferocious growling) (quieter growling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The minute I see his head!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance through and you see a large, burning ball of fire that's right there, just chilling. You see Doty (heavy footsteps) running away towards the water, where you see Taryon being pushed back in the water by a large bear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the fireball's around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as soon as you glance up... a dual arrow release.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you get two strikes on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I'm literally doing this, so does she get me in the fucking eyeball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, God.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 halved. Plus three lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So eight damage. Or, because lightning's halved, too, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because you're enlarged.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So six damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whittle him down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that next one is good. That definitely hits. And then 16, 17, 19 halved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's not by anybody, is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, it is a tiny doorway, and you are a big man. The hatch you went through was a leap down, and you barely fit through. This doorway is going to cost you some movement to get through it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, balls and ass. Okay, can I, after getting shot in the face--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's like (whooshing arrow) (scream).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ernest goes to war.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ernest goes to camp. Can I break out through the door and run down here to this corner as far as I can? How far do you think I can get with my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get out there, it'll take you ten movement. To get to the doorway, it took you ten movement, to move and get out of it, so you have 30 more feet from here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. How far will that take me on those squares?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going this way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To that corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 30. You can get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, actually, can I come towards you instead of going back that way, and can I lay down prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Down and dirty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Grog is lying down prone. Is that your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Second Wind to roll a 1d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten plus two. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. You gain 12 hit points. All right. So, Grog, that's your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth. You didn't use your action, so if you wanted to, you could use your action to move again if you wanted to dash. Don't forget you have that option.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Is that 50 more feet? Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. If you're not using your action for anything else, and your Second Wind is a bonus action, if I recall, correct?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's just mad-dash tear ass towards the tower that shot me in the eyeball. I might not even get all the way, but we're going to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so instead of falling prone, you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just turn the corner and book it like the T-1000 in Terminator 2, just chopping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to go this way or this way to get towards the tower? Like, the perimeter or center?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perimeter. Perimeter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get there, and then you go prone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Say you're prone there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can totally see your head outside of the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No you can't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I can. From where I am, I can see your head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are, you cannot see him. You watched him run; he wasn't being stealthy about it and he's 12 feet tall right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Team Target Practice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're watching him (heavy footsteps) and he's just out of view, but you know exactly where he is. Ends Grog's turn. Keyleth, you're up. You see a giant Grog just (heavy footsteps) loom past the outside of the structure. You see this flickering fire of Keyleth's elemental form in the inside of this structure there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look to see if he's going to keep going. Okay, know where Grog is. Is there any windows in this little shack that we're in or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's just the doorway here and the doorway here. Those are the only--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No bars or cracks or crevices?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from what you can tell. You can investigate for it if you want to, but that'll be your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go up to Trinket over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww. You terrible person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get into Trinket's space?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's 25 feet to get into Trinket's space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, let me do my attack first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. So 20 movement right next to Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to smoke him out first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your nervous system knows to keep you awake and conscious for that whole event.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only you can prevent--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that misses on Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20 for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! So, the first one misses, the second one definitely hits. Go ahead and roll double-die damage on the second one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's un-bear-able.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I double die roll, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and then add the bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14, 15, so 30, plus 33 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Trinket takes 33 fire damage and is currently on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Trinket is like (very unhappy bear groans) (roars).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's water right there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to use my bonus action to turn over and take my flaming sphere and go (whoosh) and ram Tary again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary or Doty?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doty, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, how many damage was that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 34? I'm going to say 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? Yeah. Go ahead and roll a dexterity saving throw for Doty, and roll another 5d6 fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretty good, this is plus his dex, which is nothing. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. So, full 5d6 fire damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those don't count, it's fine. That's not great. I can reroll that one. Two, four, six, eight, 11 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have our first victim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Doty!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the ball slams into the back, you watch as Doty's open chamber where the book is held goes (cling) and flings open as fire bursts out from the inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Protect the book!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's now burnt and hollowed out from the inside, and you watch as a cinder cluster of pages hits the ground before burning away. Doty goes, "Tar--" (clang) and falls to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry! Sorry, guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the fire ignite his cannon hand?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, he's rolling for it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One arm detonates. It doesn't hit anybody, but there's now curled pieces of broken and sheared metal where the arm once was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my other 25 feet of movement that I have left to go back into the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the speed of your fire elemental?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have 25-- no, it was-- you have 30 more feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go back inside for cover.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like she was never there. This crazy fireball came out, lit a bear on fire and went back in the room!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have a certain amount of health potions or anything like that? Like a set number of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's that, I'm sorry?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we start with like a set number of health potions or anything? Like one each, or two each.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or is it just what we had on our body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the sake of fairness, because I realize now if one of you guys was the keeper of the health potions you'd be way too unfair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I have a shitload.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we aren't, but yeah that's true, Grog always has a bunch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say none of you have health potions on you right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have to search the battlefield to discover things to help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm way too ragey to search for shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry for beating up Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Keyleth, that's the end of your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Taryon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex is mad at me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's a lootdrop. We just have to-- Like he's like such a lootdrop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, wait. Ten rounds it lasts, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore, it's now eight. It's nine rounds or eight rounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't, none of us do anything. If we don't do anything for a minute, Tary's weak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be so fucked up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't believe them, Grog, they'll turn on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why is there a tapping on this end of the earpiece?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is such a Community episode: in eight rounds he dies of exposure. I wait nine rounds. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) That's so true. It's so true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Tary, you have your four healing potions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I take one of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action you can, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take one. Yeah! Oh, that's cocked. Ooh! Ten points, I am whole again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're going to attempt to move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! I mean sure, when Trinket pushed me do I have momentum that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The momentum is now going this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'll turn around and I'll go that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you get. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check that chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a full action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go (chest opening) throw the chest open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a mimic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ha, shit. No, you do find a greater healing potion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take the greater healing potion. And then I've got some movement, right, okay. And then I go one, two, three, four-- Can I get to behind that building? Behind the building towards you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no like directly-- Yeah, like as far over there as possible. I'll come out the door I came in. Yeah, over there. And if I have anything left I'll start walking up the wall. I know I won't make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can get to the very top if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not quite, next round I'm going to pop up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we'll say you're right there. But this chest is opened, so I'll turn it to the side as a reminder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Knock it prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! That's the end of your turn, Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. The fiery braziers around suddenly begin to (explosion) and detonate, as the flames inside burst out in a radius. Nobody is quite in the radius to be affected by them. You watch as the corners of the battlefield are suddenly engulfed in flames briefly. Then the flames retract back into just very gently burning braziers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love it. This is like Battlebots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, Grog's coming for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: First of all, Trinket's going to just wade out into that water to get no longer on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, Trinket first takes three points of fire damage at the top of the round. Trinket wades into the water and does manage to put out the fire. However, Trinket does take--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, it's acid or something. What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- does take six points of acid damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, that shit's not water, it's acid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, it is not water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He called that shit poop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Trinket wades in he goes (acid sounds) (hurt bear sounds).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Trinket goes ow, ow, and then he comes back out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets back out of the water, and he's like-- you see like the (sizzling) off of him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, I didn't even tell you to do that, you just did that on your own! And then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If a bear could shrug--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you know. And then I'm going to get on my broom--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is a whale?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's a whale? I get on my broom and I want to fly up and over, above Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you (whoosh) over, and as you get up, you almost bump into the ceiling where that tower is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, could I actually get to Grog if I was flying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you were flying from here? You could get right over there and see him on the ground, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I couldn't get down to him, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could get right down to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is going to be the worst move ever if it doesn't work. I'm going to get down to where Grog is. This is so stupid, though! No, because if it doesn't work I can't get away! Because that's all my movement, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's team up, you and me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I take my necklace off and I put it into my hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is not hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's a one. Whatever. I still try to touch it to him. Whatever, he doesn't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. So Grog, do you accept it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She still touches it to you, but you're not willing, so what's the saving throw on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sneaky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only a ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (suction sound) Grog, you are absorbed into a familiar dark stony throne room, staring out through this small open space, almost like a personalized movie theater of the outside of the necklace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I get out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't unless I release you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has to release you. Mind you, Vex, the battle cannot be won until all the other people have been defeated. This is not considered defeat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could release him into the acid, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, man. My mind's already there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, just be aware, if you're the last one standing after everything else happens and you release Grog, he's going to destroy you, so think tactically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I plan on it, believe me. I'm going to use my bonus action to stay hidden from... for my skirmisher stealth, can I pick a target? I want to stay hidden from Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cannot, because in order to get there, your full movement leaves you right in the doorway where she can see you. You literally landed, did that to Grog, and turned over your shoulder and see a giant fire elemental looking right at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. So I can't use my bonus action to hide, because she's right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, because you're not behind anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight. I'm going to then use my skirmisher to stay hidden from Percy, and I've got nothing I can do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. Fuck! Like a rat in a cage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just (groans).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pink and plush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? I was picturing something from Saw, like the inside is just awful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The inside is essentially a 20-by-20-foot cold stone room with a central stone throne, and the view you have is this ten-foot-by-five-foot slit window that looks out from the necklace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it fish-eyed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like prison. You could do some push-ups.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, are you skipping me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, you're up next. Grog, what do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to flip the fuck out! I'm inside of a goddamn box! I'm going to take my Dwarven Thrower and throw it as hard as I can at the window!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. I'm getting out of here in no time. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 25 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good. You are also technically sieged because of your gauntlets.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, double damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you slam your axe into the front of this, you watch as the stone (rumble) quakes a little bit, and a little bit of dust (hiss) settles from the ceiling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could bust out of the necklace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, this is also Matt Mercer, who had us fight an entire thing, taking down damage the whole time while nothing was happening. I'll take all three attacks at the window. Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean if I put an actual monster inside of it during the game that they could break out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They'd have to think of it. I wouldn't think of attacking the room, and he's designed to hurt rooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's designed to not think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's designed to make terrible choices.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The room could collapse and squish him like a bug, for all we know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That critical is 55.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's 110 points of damage with your siege weaponry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so dead, you guys. He's going to pop out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rear back for your second strike, you bring your axe to go against this crystalline field, this layer that defends you from that. As you slam it, the axe hits and you watch as it spider-cracks (cracking) all across, and the room (rumbling) is now actively shaking. As you look around, you can see that the walls are starting to crumble, and rocks begin to tumble, and you see what looks like a black void behind the cracks that are opening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, that could be really bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a third attack, Grog. What are you going to do, Mr. Raging?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, I love watching his brain strain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No way. You are lying!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you get sucked into a random void? Then we can never defeat you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll some damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he gets sucked into a random void, I imagine that would be considered defeat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, he would be fucking dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 60 this time, so 120.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 120 points of damage. So Grog. You rear back once more, and that little bit of doubt in the back of your brain, you quickly squash! As your frenzied fury takes over, you see nothing but red, anger, and blood, as you rear back a third time and (whack). As you slam it, you hear what sounds like a thousand windows shattering at once, and all the walls suddenly collapse in towards you, rocketing and spiraling inward. It crushes into your body as you're thrust forward as the crystalline structure ahead of you shatters and pulls you through like a heavy vacuum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, he's out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or he's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 26 points of piercing and bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved to 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved to 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And imploded from the inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the necklace in front of you (shattering) shatters off your chest, and you watch as a giant Grog, right there into the hallway, right in front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit! So much just happened!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I reference Terminator 2 later...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You punched a hole through time and space. Well done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your necklace is gone. It is not functional for the rest of this battle. I was not expecting you to attack the inside of the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was just going to do it because he's an idiot, but that really worked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! That ends your turn, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to release you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In acid!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to turn around and be like (screams, booming) on both of these guys. I'm going to move into Vex's space and then attack Grog. (bam, bam)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You're technically occupying Vex's space, right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one, much better. That hits. 16 plus six is 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? That hits, yeah. So go ahead and roll damage against Vex. Vex, you also catch fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm attacking Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Grog! I misunderstood, sorry. So Grog, you catch fire. Flames are just (whoosh).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're having a weird six seconds of your life right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know! (panting, warp sound effect, screaming) Hulk angry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's 20 fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 20 points of fire damage, reduced to ten, and you're on fire. And you will remain on fire, taking 1d10 fire damage every round, until you spend an action to put it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it looks cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it looks cool. All right, and because you moved into Vex's space, Vex, you also catch fire automatically. Does she immediately take the 1d10 damage for occupying someone's space?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 1d10 fire damage and catches fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, both of them, because you had to move into both of their spaces to do it, so you take another 1d10 damage, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five for Vex and four for Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Grog, you take two points of fire damage. Vex, you take five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my retaliation strike after her melee on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Reckless! Where's the crit now? That's what I want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, that's a valid point. Go ahead and roll, because he did reckless attack last turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, you do get advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, on that first one again? Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So what's your attack roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is going to hurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, you're fine. No, that's going to hurt. I'm just kidding. Yeah, 25. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage to your fire elemental form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Is that halved because it's bludgeoning? No, his weapon's magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take full damage. However, doesn't he take damage whenever he...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, when he attacks me, he takes another 1d10 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I'm an asshole. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take four points of fire damage. All righty. Keyleth, so that's your action. You've moved 15 feet to get into Vex's and Grog's space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to back out and around again, through the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's 15, 20, 25, 30. You're going to stay in the room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you have 20 more feet of movement from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let me go out one more and onto this lip next to Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to take my bonus action to take my Flaming Sphere, and I want to jump it over this shallow end on this far side. I've got cameras right in front of me. It can jump over a ten-foot gap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much does it move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 30. Can it get ten more feet over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, 30. It'll get just about there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the edge? If it looks like it's not going to land in the acid, and extinguish it or something weird?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it'll probably land in the acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would it extinguish it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'll keep it there on the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next round, it can. It doesn't have the movement for the full jump, unfortunately. So it's right there on the edge (fire noises) angrily burning. I need you to make a concentration check, by the way, with advantage, for the damage that Grog hit you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take that. 16. What do I have to get over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a constitution saving throw, and you have to beat half his damage that he did to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So he did 25 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 12, half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So yeah, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Keyleth. Taryon!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi. I'm going to read my Scroll of Fire Shield, setting it to a warm shield that will protect me from all cold damage and last for ten minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one can hurt you in there anyway, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, but when I get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, so your Scroll of Fire Shield, you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire Shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, that's ten minutes. Not concentration. So you said warm shield, which gives you resistance to cold damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll roll my ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you've got 40 feet of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going towards that corner.
