lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, top right. And I'll also pull out my rod and I'll say, crossbow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clang) Turns into a nice crossbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll load it with a bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pulling around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You turn the corner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Casting Hex on Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is now hexed and on fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now I'm going to take a sharpshooter shot and add a point of grit for an aimed shot to the legs. Actually, does that make that harder for me to shoot him later?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have pretty big legs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I mean if you're prone. I can still shoot him just fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not with sharpshooter, I think. If they're prone, we don't take disadvantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If they're prone, an attack roll against the creature has advantage if they're within five feet. Otherwise it's disadvantage. If the person is prone, it's harder for you to hit with ranged weapons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that case, I'm going to hold on that grit, and I'm instead going to use a piercing shot with sharpshooter. So for shot number one, with Animus, sharpshooter. Oh, for fuck's sake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a misfire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's another misfire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is not very Percy of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. Irritated, I pull out Bad News and take another shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is this also piercing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is also piercing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's another grit spent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it... That's better. 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, that hits. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get to also roll an attack against Vex, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically, the shot goes through both of you. It goes through Grog's shoulder (explosion) and has enough weight to actually impact and hit Vex in the same shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thankfully, it can't misfire when I do this. 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you watch as the muscle of the shoulder explodes, and in that brief second you dodge your head out of the way, and watch as the ball goes (whoosh) and skims the edge of your cheek. A little blood goes (flick) down the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I glare at Percy, from under Grog's armpit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glare at him through the hole in his shoulder, Tombstone-style.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog doesn't understand why you're so mad at his shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, shit. So that's (counting). That's 33 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33 points of piercing damage. That's 16.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus four necrotic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four necrotic, not halved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to take a Retort shot, because this is the fucking day I'm having, and I'm going to burn another grit, and I'm going to try and knock him prone, because you're welcome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just have a thing for me today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, too. This is another sharpshooter with Retort. Ugh, that's a 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Snitch is failing you tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This time you turn around and see Percy there. He pulls out the Retort shot, and you're like (whoosh) and duck right out of the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm diving back behind the bloody doorway, goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's about the extent of your movement, there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. That did not go well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep. Oh, you have a disadvantage on wisdom saving throws right now. Wisdom checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because of Hex? Wisdom saves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not saving throws, checks. So insight, perception, things like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most things that I normally suck balls at anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to make sure you really suck at them right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The pillars that you see in the center here begin to (vibration) emit that weird, vibrating hum again, and you feel, Keyleth, as the gravitational pull warps around you but doesn't affect your form, because of your Freedom of Movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like the Matrix.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Trinket seems to (groans) be pulled down by the gravity of it. You watch as Doty's form on the ground across the way, (crack) gravity crushes a little further in towards the stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it anything inside of the four pillars or in circles around each pillar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take two psychic damage on top of that. I forgot about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you put yourself out as an action? Okay. First thing, at the top of your round, you take four points of fire damage. You spend the action to put yourself out, so you are now no longer on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a bonus action. From Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. And I'm going to kick off the ground and fly up as high as I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can disengage now? Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: we'll say 40 feet. Yeah, you're up near the top, straight up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be over the roof of the building below me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you get a little ways over. We'll say about... there. Ends your turn? Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high is Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's about 40 feet up from you right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I'm on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you take three points of fire damage, reduced to one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am going to stay on fire, because fuck it, and I am going to use my max speed to advance towards Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you turn. All right, you're advancing towards Percy. (counting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, can I use my Boots of Feral Leaping to jump 20 feet horizontally in the direction of Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your check to see if you succeed or not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You land right on the opposite side of Percy. We'll push this open just a little bit to get your placement as you slam into the ground right next to him. (heavy impact). All of a sudden, Percival, you're standing against the wall and you hear (footsteps). Nothing. (explosion) Right to the right of you, the sudden slam of stone, as the behemoth goliath Grog lands next to you, grinning, blood pouring out of the bullet wound in his shoulder, big smile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I stick my finger in the bullet wound hole and taste it and go, hi. And can I take all three attacks, reckless, great weapon master, the whole smash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If that was the real Percy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know! Some phantom bastard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm only nine hit points down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, this is the hammer, so I don't have great weapon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you took Blood Axe, didn't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you went to hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I've been using the hammer. 28.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good to hear. That's a 26 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of damage to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 26 points of damage? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not part of the plan. Hey, that's okay, that's only a two, plus a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you rolled a what? What did you roll for damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, the dice landed on a two, plus my modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, hold on. What level fighter are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, which means...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I can re-roll a one or two for damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That's the great weapon fighting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, dude. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't used that yet, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's cocked. That's an eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He likes to hit things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 72 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that everything so far? Is that rolled into what you just did?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's just the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, so how much is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it was a 24. 24 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You double the dice, not the bonus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double the dice. Okay. Not the modifier, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just the dice. So you rolled an eight, so it's 16, plus the modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your brutal critical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is another damage dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is another three additional damage dice at level 17, Grog. Well, no, because you're not a level 17 barbarian, so it is two. You're right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Yeah. That's a ten. That's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, that's two. An additional 19 to the 30.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 51 points, so I'm at 26. 51.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Third.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see how it goes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 27 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's only 19 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I actually have to do the math to see. I don't think I'm unconscious. No, I'm not, but that hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're close, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was 76 points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do the math with a calculator--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 76 plus 19? Right? The last hit was 19 points of damage? So 76 total before that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 26, 51, and 19. I've taken 105 points of damage. I have 35 points remaining.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's fine!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did 96, wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at 140 points. I have 140 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Sorry, just doing the math here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also had nine points of damage from psychic damage from my own fucking gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, total! I see. Okay. Grog, not a bad round. You did 96 points of damage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (heavy footfalls, impact noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! So, that's Grog's turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (heavy breathing) Okay, Vex is flying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex is flying up on the top, on her broom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're all alone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my bonus action, go ahead and get this out of the way first, to get my Flaming Sphere over that gap and ram it into Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are so cruel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have Trinket roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a druid. I'm sorry! I feel bad about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! 5d6 points of fire damage on Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I don't have the necklace anymore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so he'll just be dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six, 12, 18, 22 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 21 points is what he had. Trinket is unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unconscious and burning. Smoke (sizzling) off the burnt fur. (sad bear sounds)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I still have my full movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full movement and action; that was just your bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I take any extra damage because I didn't put the fire out at the end of the round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's at the top of your round that you take the damage. Oh, and Percy? Roll concentration checks for Hex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I took how many points of damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could roll a natural 20 and save it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could roll a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first attack, just roll higher than a 14, we'll say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Hex is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hex gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hex-a-gone! All right. Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to haul ass. Do I have enough movement if I dash, or whatever, to get into that building?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speed of 50, right? You can try, I don't want to tell you if you can or not. You can try to figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) Yeah, I'll try it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're good at jumping over bodies of water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going over water, man! Can I peek in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get just there on the inside. You see, it's largely empty and there is a chest that's currently open and looks empty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, as you're running by, a large hammer over the top of the wall on the opposite side going (thuds). These heavy, wet thuds. All right, so that's your movement. You have your action, still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right! Oh my god! Okay. I'm going to use my action to expend a level-2 spell slot to heal myself. With my spell slot to heal myself in wild shape thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. It's a bonus action to do that, which you already used to move your sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't use my action? I'm basically wasting an action to do it instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I heal nine hit points in my form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, man. I'm glad you're so approving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You're there in the corner with your crossbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. I'm going to-- crossbow in one hand, I'm going to take my broom and stick it between my legs. Ready to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there room for that? How big is that damn orb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: You can fit it up inside there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I will continue my movement. Where am I? Am I that thing in the corner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here, way over in the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go around the wall so nobody can see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Five, ten, 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll stay there, and then I'll try something. It's not going to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to try?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think it'll work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so. It says no effects can pass through the sphere. I assume no effects can affect the sphere, either.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to make a judgment call here, based on the wording. Give me just one second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you drop it prematurely if you want to, whenever you want?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm trapped in here. Trapped for a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're in the bomb shelter. You don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll let me out when they're ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can pass through the sphere...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think it's going to work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's kind of brilliant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say sure. It's not passing through it, it's creating a passable window in the sphere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the ruling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hover out a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go ahead and pull it off and slap it, and you watch as a little two-foot-by-two-foot window opens up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to leave yet. I'm staying in the safety of the sphere for at least one more round, ready to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really hope the fire pillar goes off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still in the sphere!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you've got a hole in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I realize that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (explosion, screams)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, fire pillars, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. That ends your turn, Tary? Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh here's a hail Mary. First thing I'm going to do is I'm going to use my bonus action to down a potion of greater healing, which is how many d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greater healing is 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's not a bad roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 15 points of healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, not bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's one hit from Grog that I can now take.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, might keep you alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and hit him with Diplomacy. Since I'm technically in grappling distance, I can't shoot, and if I try to move, he's going to hit me, so I'm going to attempt to hit him with Diplomacy and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is that, since I haven't used it...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does it say on the card?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is the card? I have a lot of them out. It's a dex-based unarmed melee attack. Just dex modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just dex modifier. Well, no. I'd say add your proficiency, as well, because you built the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Add the proficiency bonus? Okay, thank you. That's less of a hail Mary. Slightly. Oh my god. 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, buddy! No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've rolled three ones and a two this game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's unreal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's one attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another round with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So Percy's (frustrated grunting) trying to reach out towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my AC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay! That's 2d12 electrical damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lightning damage to you, so that's halved.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 24 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 12 points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guess what. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which I have disadvantage on?

lines.name: LAURA, MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You actually no longer have disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Hex went away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That's a 27.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a 27?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My constitution is amazing. Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a fucking barbarian.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm so fucked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it do anything to him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would've saved my goddamned life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If he would've rolled low, that would've saved you, probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, if he had rolled low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he take any damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the fuck else am I going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's just Grog putting his finger in the socket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can run like a motherfucker. Let's see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had an action surge I forgot about last time, so consider this borrowed time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you had advantage on your attacks against him because he used reckless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I can't use my gun, can I? Oh wait, I would've had advantage, but I didn't get advantage on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would've had advantage, so the two attack rolls we'll say were one attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't hit him with my gun, but I can still hit him with my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can hit him with the gun. You just have disadvantage with the strikes, but you have advantage, so it would be just a straight roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. So I have two more sword attacks, and then I've got to figure out some shit. Let's take two--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you have four attacks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have three attacks. But I had advantage, so technically that was one attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm going to take two sword attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, man. You got this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't. That's a 27 piercing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are you rolling damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm sorry. That's to hit. I'm sorry, my brain is-- you're scaring me. 25 to hit and 21 to hit, so both hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Most of your war paint is gone, by the way, Travis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did that happen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) 22 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 11 points piercing damage, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't use an action to disengage unless you have it. I'm just fucked, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You can still run, but he gets to swipe at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take my heal with that action surge. I'm going to heal up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Going to hold down the fort? You're looking down the barrel, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know. That's awful. 14 points of healing, but it'll get me away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take my retaliation strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 26 to hit? Hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So fucking nonchalant, like he doesn't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 24. Okay. That's his reaction, so I can run now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You may flee.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Well, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You can flee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you can stand here and face it, like a man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you'll be laughing when I'm far away from you. I've got to get some distance. I'm going to start running straight up the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can still hit you if you run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I already did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's as far as you can get with your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there an entrance to the tower there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two doors and a ladder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't need a ladder, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can run up the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to go around that wall. I want to go

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up this wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cat on a hot tin roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of my fucking turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The electrical towers at the top cycle (electricity noises) and flash with a bolt of energy. Nobody is in the radius to be affected; no effect. That brings us to Vex. Up at the top, as you flew up there on the broom, you felt your head and shoulders bump and hit the ceiling, and you're like, shit. Arrows ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welp. I can see Percy, so I'm going to Hunter's Mark him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to attack him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The love of your life. Bathtub buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's a bramble shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you have to roll a strength DC.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have to roll a strength check against bramble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, roll damage for everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For the regular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For all of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh right. Okay, wait. That's an additional 4d8.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit. Yeah, no. I'm fucked, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, man. Better to be done by your lover than by me. I left that action surge out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I have another action surge that I didn't-- I was hoping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (adding) 38, plus six lightning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 38 plus six lightning damage? And then I'm going to take... ugh, this is the worst I've ever rolled in my life. 38 plus six lightning. I'm going to bring that down to 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From the Gloves of Missile Snaring. So 38 down to 25. Plus six lightning damage? Still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're on the wall, you feel the sense, this burning in your ears, and you glance up just as you watch an arrow (arrow sound) come towards you and as it bursts open, this series of tendrils of vines, you reach over and grab and stop the arrow, somewhat, before it pierces into you, but you still manage to pull it back and the vines begin to ensnare around you. Go ahead and roll a strength saving throw, I believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DC 17. They (whoosh) wrap around you and you find yourself--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength saving throw, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does succeed. So as they wrap around you, you (strained grunting) and burst off of them and the arrow breaks out and they all turn gray and wither into dust as they hit the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do another... no, I'm not. I'm not going to do a bramble shot on him. I'm just going to do a regular shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, he's taking half damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm bleeding out. I'm just blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, do you only get to use the catch once?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once per turn. It's a reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12, 14, 16 plus six lightning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fall unconscious and off the wall, hitting the ground. You take three points of bludgeoning damage as you hit, which is an immediate failed death save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we doing death saves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's part of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you could theoretically recover and come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you roll a natural 20 on your death save. It's happened before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, okay. Those are my two attacks, so can I fly down to the ground behind the building... actually, they're all over on the other side. I'm going to drop down where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Drop down to the roof?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, to the roof. And I'm going to lay down on the roof and use my bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. As far as you know, no one has any idea where the hell you are. All right, that ends your turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see Vex...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch her (descending noise).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But she was shooting at my quarry. I turn the corner towards where Percy is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you lumber around, you go and see his unconscious body there, on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) Percy von Fredrickstein de blah, skittles and balls and ass. What happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spin the hammer, right down on his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you move in. That's ten more feet. Go ahead and roll, with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) That's a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's an auto-crit because it was within five feet. How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start to swing down. Did he get new glasses? I take them. (heavy impact) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole face caves in as the hammer scatters him like a Gallagher watermelon across the stone floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival is no more. First to fall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much speed did I use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 15, 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the sound of the first cannon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to leap, with the feral leaping, 20 feet toward the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Toward the tower this way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Entrance, down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you want to. Go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You land (grunt, impact noise) right toward the base.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the remainder of my speed to run up the tower?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he's still on fire, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Oh, I need to take the fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Last round, or just this one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just this one. I took it last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's five fire damage, reduced to two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two. On fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you disappear into the center of the tower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 feet in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get partway up the stairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a winding thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a spiral staircase. All right, that ends your turn, Grog. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I saw Vex shooting Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you were inside the cusp of this building the entire time. Glancing around there, you saw her up there, and make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 20. No, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. You got the gist. You watched her descend, but you have no idea directly where she is. You know she's somewhere in this area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So I don't see anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know where she is. If you have an area something you want to do, you could probably hit her, but you can't aim a specific attack directly at her because you can't see her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I am going to start by moving my fire ball. Jeez. There's not a lot I can do. I saw Grog run by, as well, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw Grog run by this way, and that's the last you saw. And you know that Vex is somewhere in this area. What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move out and around on this side, my movement over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and use my bonus action to heal a little bit more. Actually, no, can I use my action to heal like last time and use my bonus action to move my sphere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: yeah, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to move my sphere right in front of the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet for the sphere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, however far it can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, that's as far as it can get right there. Okay, that ends your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any more movement? I'll pop back in the building a little bit, and that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Taryon, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many rounds is this? Four? Five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the sixth round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the fifth round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the fifth round. After this will be the sixth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Invisibility. And I want to fly out of the sphere and to a vantage point of your choosing, so no one knows where I am, somewhere between 20 and 40 feet high, maybe towards the center-ish of the game field. Up to you where.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I know where you are. That's your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Taryon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know where?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I don't want to know where I am so you don't know where I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No longer Percy's turn. So with that, the braziers--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that understood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't affect anybody. That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take off from the roof and try to make it to the opposite tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The opposite tower, flying over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see the flickering flames of Keyleth within the inside, in the very cusp of this. She has three-quarters cover, but you have sharpshooter, so you ignore that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then I'll try to hit her. I'm going to attack her! That's a 27.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to do a bramble shot on her, because I only did the one. 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to hit? That hits. Damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (counting) 32, plus three lightning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 35, damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the brambles wrap around her, the flames burn them away. She's immune to being restrained.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I figured. I bet Tary's up here, but I don't know that. I'm going to use my bonus action to hide. I was hidden at the beginning of the turn, but I'm assuming my movement took me out of hiding. Can I use my skirmisher's stealth to choose a quarry to stay hidden? Or I have to be hidden at the top of the turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, yeah. We're skirting a line, here, of watching you go up and land. You aren't amongst trees in a forest. It's easy to see where you are, vaguely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I don't see any immediate chests in this big tower, right? It's just a stairwell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's just stairwell. Like when you went through the other one, it's empty, more of a gaining of ground and/or protective space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Live and let die, motherfuckers! Can I run out of the tower, straight towards the pool of acid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got ten feet in, so ten feet out. You still have 40 at the doorway. There's a Flaming Sphere there, which you're like, "oh, avoid!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm aiming to try and make my way to this structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, 30, 35, 40. You're just stepping over the corpse of Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I forgot he's just unconscious. He's not dead yet. I haven't been making saving throws for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's doing okay for now. Grog, that's your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What square am I on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're technically right here. You have your action, still. You can dash if you want to get all the way there, or you can attack something in the vicinity. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You get inside here and see a small chest by the doorway there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I move to the chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move to the chest, but it'll take an action to open it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my action surge, which I have not used, to open the chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can. You do. You open it up, and there is a potion bottle within it. So you acquire the potion. You open the chest and you grab the potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, and I can't do anything else? Can I consume it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your bonus action, still, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! That's right. Chug-a-lug, bitches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gimme some squares. No, 4d4. I need some triangles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're doing this while on fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. 4d4 plus four. 14 points. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Grog's done. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. (grunts) Going to go ahead and drop my fire elemental form. It's looking pretty rough now. Hope I don't fuck that up. And I'm going to peek around the corner and I can see Vex a little up on the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil, don't fuck me! Oh, that's good! 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance up the tower, and you see just the edge of Vex trying to hide around the stonework. You see her feather and the edge of her hair, and you see her right up on the top.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be like, (yelling) your blue feather is very pretty against the stonework!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I yell it through the earring, and it deafens her a little bit. (yelps) Ow, feedback.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I hear Tary go (yelps) anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fire Storm down the side? How many cubes is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rain fire down everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's nasty. Okay, Fire Storm. Ten ten-foot cubes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I don't know where Tary is. I haven't seen him in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could even get to Grog, if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a fire waterfall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is. It's very Minecraft. (fire noises) All right, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw, Vex. And Marisha, roll 7d10.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's the damage of Fire Storm, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, my spell DC is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you succeed, so half damage. Just barely succeeded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get to reroll ones. Do you have one more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, in my bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The front doors, by the way, of this tower? Are now on fire. The wooden doors at the bottom have now caught flame from the Fire Storm, and you can see elements of the inside the tower are starting to catch fire, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, so the passage through them would...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many? 10d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get to reroll ones once because of your staff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) 26.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (continues counting) 52.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 26 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was Tary in there, at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was?! Or he was not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I honestly have no idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you moved, you said, "I go to you know where?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I said, you pick me a place. I don't want to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knows where, but nobody else does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on your specifications and the movement of the broom, yes. I know where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to take my bonus action. I know Grog ran vaguely in this direction, so I'm going to take my 30 feet of movement of my Flaming Sphere and move it toward that tower that Grog is towards. Yeah, is that 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's 30 feet there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm going to pop back into cover, hug against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, that brings us to Taryon!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. I lose Invisibility if I cast a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, or attack something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or attack something. Does drinking something count as casting a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will drink a Swift-Step Draught, increasing my walking speed now to 60, plus my Boots of Speed, which makes it 120.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the fastest motherfucker on the planet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your walking speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I know. Just for future rounds, would dropping a Smoke Stick count as an attack? It doesn't hurt anyone; it just makes some smoke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about dropping a Tanglefoot Bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's starting to borderline on an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, cool. I think that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not too sure. You can try it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The speed thing. And oh, can you just tell me, without telling me where I am, do I know the location of Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. And do I know the location of everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You watched Grog run past, you watched Vex get set fire in a tower, and you watched Keyleth cast the spell and then disappear inside the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Vex on fire again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not caught fire, but you watched flames consume her briefly. (laughs) It seems to be a theme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, just move me around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's your turn, Taryon. All right, top of the round. The arcane towers burst. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck. Oh, that's great; that definitely saves. 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? Okay, that would be 11 points of lightning damage, reduced to five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vex, your turn. As the flames subside, you're like (pants). You glance over and you can see Keyleth vanish back inside that room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) But I can't see her? I can't see anybody from where I am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you have no view of her, but you just watched her just barely step inside. You can still get perspective if you were to move to get a better angle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This board was designed to actually fuck with the two of us, because we don't have any good long-distance shots but they have nothing but cover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's nowhere for us to hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's plenty of places for you guys to hide. There's nothing but hiding places!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I know. It's ground hiding. I'm going to fly up towards you, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to hover right there. Wait, can I see Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can barely see Keyleth out of the side, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but three-quarters, and I can still attack her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, because you have sharpshooter, so you can attack her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to attack her. She's in that building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to about there. You can look down and you see her poking out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be low enough that at the end of my movement I can drop down to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I see.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, drop down to the roof. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so we'll say you can be there. You can get down to the roof and see her from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah. That works, too! She's still Hunter's Marked from before, isn't she?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you ever Hunter's Mark me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You Hunter's Marked Grog, I thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Hunter's Marked Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy. That's what it was. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to move my Hunter's Mark to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth as a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wait. That's a bonus action, just to move it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then never mind. I'm not going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It probably is; I'm not going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're not Hunter's Marking her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16, plus five lightning damage. And I'm going to hit her again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah. I'm good. I rolled a natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the second attack is 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 plus four lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 20 points of damage. Go ahead and roll another concentration check. Just roll higher than a ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With my modifier, right? With my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whatever your constitution saving throw is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So maintains concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was thinking I had a potion, but I don't, and I can't cast a Cure Wounds. That's an action. And I can't retrograde a Hex on her. So I'm going to try to hide again, because that's the only bonus I can do right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't really have any way to hide from her right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to drop down to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you drop prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's an angle you can hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, we'll say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have any movement. I used all my movement just to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight. Because there's no such thing as Fire Storm, which just fucking destroyed me. No such thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. Don't have any more of those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I'll roll a natural 20 and then she'll just not know that I dropped down. I rolled a natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking right, she did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it matter at all that I rolled a natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watched her vanish. You know she's somewhere on or near that roof, but you're not specifically aware. So that ends your turn. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Straight up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, yep. You actually land on Doty's head, crushing it into the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the remainder of my 50 feet of speed to run into the building that Vex is in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is being so smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the rest of your movement, there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can dash if you want to move all the way in, but you won't have an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can still touch the building.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn, I thought that was going to be just enough. I am going to dash inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you head inside, and you get to the appearance of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're too big for the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get in there, and there is the chest there, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. That is my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you drink the potion that you found? What was it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a greater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea where Vex is at the moment. The last you saw her, she was on the roof, and you watched Grog dart by without seeing you and then run into the building right across the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. All right. Fucking hell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. It's a horrifying piece of paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to pee so bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, what if I die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Fuck. Fuck! What am I going to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do something crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I do a Fire Storm around there, can I also call on the inside of the room, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's just making them adjacent to each other. That can be in height, too, yeah. As long as they're against a surface.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it. Let's do that again. Pop out once again from the spire, (war cry) coming down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So how many points has that spent on the spire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I only did it once, so that's seven, so that brings me to another seven, so I have six points left in the spire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. You're causing it to consume the entire roof?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. And because I heard Grog run in that area, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you can just fill the roof and then down the side and then fill the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just lighting up that tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so I need both Grog and Vex to make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That might be all she wrote. We'll find out. I have advantage on these. That's not awesome. That's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does not make it. So roll 7d10 fire damage. You take half of it because you're resistant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've also been hit a lot. I don't like getting that close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What just fell all over the floor?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you just do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Acted like I pushed you off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled two tens, so that's 20. Two eights, so that's 36. 41. 44. One, two, three, four, five, six, 44 plus seven is 51. One, two, three, four, five, six, seven. 7d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. 51 points of fire damage to you Grog, halve that to 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still conscious?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. Vex, you take the same thing. 25 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For my bonus action, I want to bring my Flaming Sphill to block this doorway that I'm in front of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Flaming Sphere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sphill. The Flaming Sphill is what she said, and that is what it forever will be called.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Flaming Sphere hits there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: fuck. Around here, on the outside, and hide. Did you get where I said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're right. So yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to go on this side of the building to use for cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Perfect. And then I don't have anything else I can do, do I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you did everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I only called a giant Fire Storm!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I also hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you spent all your actions. They're well aware of where you are; they watched you (footsteps) around the corner. You hear (heavy breathing) around the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, I hope that wasn't a mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Keyleth's turn. Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume, because you know me, Matt, and you're a skilled strategery man, that I am somewhere near Doty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, with your movement, reach him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hover near him, over him-- but not right over him, everybody! And just chuck that Smoke Stick right on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (hissing gas) What's the radius of that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's only a ten-foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth's the only one that can see it out of the corner of your eye. You watch as where Doty's body is, suddenly smoke fills this area here, obscuring Doty's currently not moving body. That's your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So wait, where did you go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, actually. I'm in the air, somewhere within a 30-foot circle of Doty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If this is going to continue, I want you to tell me where you're going, just to come over and whisper to me. Otherwise this is getting a little weird. For the first round, it's fine, but...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start texting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can text me if you want to, or come by and whisper real fast. All right. That brings us to top of the round...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is anyone still on fire, like Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit of smoke (coughs) out of the mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I flew up to the top of the tower, nobody would see me that I know, right? Right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you know of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to fly up to the top of the tower by me. But I'm going to be at the back. I'm going to step away from the edge so that people on the ground can't see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, about there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get with your full movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and I'm going to use my action to cast Cure Wounds at 3rd level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is 3d8. 15, plus my spellcasting modifier, which is 18 points. So I heal 18 points of health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of health to you. All right, got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to use my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's still doing okay. Succeeded two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I can't go down there. Before I moved, can I have cast Hunter's Mark on Keyleth, for my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't have visual on her at that time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still don't have visual? Do I have visual on her now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not since you moved away from the edge. You moved out of the way to make sure nobody could see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say I moved up, cast Hunter's Mark on her, and then backed off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah. She wasn't hidden. So she's marked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's the end of your turn. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Can I use my bonus action to take the healing potion in that room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't opened the chest yet. So your action (bang) open the chest. Grab the potion, bonus action to drink it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The chest wasn't on fire and the potion wasn't destroyed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was four, reduced to two, because you're still burning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) You're still burning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not wasting any actions to put himself out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I look fucking crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were Hunter's Marked, by the way, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Did I get hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just Hunter's Marked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. And can I use my movement... to go to this corner behind the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is loving that fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! Does he see an empty ball sitting there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run over and you see a giant, empty hamster ball with a big window carved in it that's empty and derelict.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Empty?! That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh my god. This is so scary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have that thing you can do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do have that thing I can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the Kill Everyone spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that Kill Everyone spell... It's time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time. Yeah! I've been waiting for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to, thinking of the acidy black pit in front of us, and remembering Umbrasyl, I am going to turn into an adult black dragon. (war cry) Full werewolf transformation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you serious right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to use a red one, but you are a black one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I burn my Shapechange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You are still Hunter's Marked, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope I don't die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we got this. We got this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do some shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't exist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously! Just a bystander, this whole fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can move, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can still move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So how deep is this watery pit? Does it go pretty deep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only one way to find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to, as a dragon, see how far I can get. I'm going to go black dragon, who can swim and is immune to acid. I'm going to go (heavy footsteps) and see if I can lay underneath the surface of the acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You delve into the pool with a splash as it spills over the edges, and you submerge yourself beneath the surface. It's just deep enough for you to get entirely within the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But all the acid pours up and out, doesn't it? Displacement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It displaces a bit, yeah. But while she's in it, she's currently submerged.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's not hurt from it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Trinket get hit by the acid? But Doty does, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty's done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. But just in case.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I thought he was immune, but he's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. And Trinket begins to slowly dissolve in his unconscious state. That is a second failed death save on Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty's done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth doesn't care about animals, apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only plants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. A little biased.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least finish him with dignity before you go into the pool. You just passed right by him. Just let him suffer, unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I could accidentally trip over him and kick him into the pool with me, if you really want me to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that your turn, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Land in the smoke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See that Doty is history.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire Prismatic Spray at the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're submerged in the water, but the spray goes through water. It's a light effect. So you grab one of your rubies, you run up to the edge of the smoke, and release a Prismatic Spray in this direction. Trinket's done. Trinket is turned to dust and ash. We're talking Terminator 2 dream sequence atomic bomb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all T2 tonight!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are people affected by my frightful presence within 120 feet? Those who are aware of me once I (heavy footsteps) and then go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an interesting point, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 120 feet, wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the only one who's seen you transform is Taryon, so Taryon, I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not high for me. No, that's terrible for me. Oh. I'm going to use Luck! I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cackles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're both terrible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One and a two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A two and a one, even better. He rolled a two. He rolled again and rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are considered frightened. You watch as Keyleth turns into this black dragon and you go (screams) and watch her dive into the acid pool and you go (screams).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So when I'm frightened, I just want to get away, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move away or adjacent, but you cannot move closer to her. You make the saving throw at the end of your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was not planning on it, anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it does mean that you have disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you still have to make a saving throw versus Prismatic Spray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. What kind of a saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out here in a second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could be anything. It could be something you're downright immune to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. Come on, acid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I need you to roll a d8, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d8. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw as an adult black dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're probably pretty dexterous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they're big fatty dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, that is really stereotypical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. So you take 10d6 poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poison! Poison for the win!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to roll 10d6, so I'm going to use one of those websites.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's 10d6. One, two, three...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I have to do all the math.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's ten. Here's ten right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got calculators out, ready to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You earned this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 34. That's not that bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34 points of poison damage to you. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points does an adult dragon have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, triple digits?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's a natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled twice, though, didn't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, because you have that feat. She has the Warcaster feat. So you're good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are we even in this fight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm no longer invisible. But I am in a protecty cloud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are. So Keyleth, while you're submerged under the acid, all of a sudden there's a spray of greenish light that coasts through the surface of the water and beams across you, and you feel a horrible poison take effect on your stomach and internal system. You're like (groans). You saw it burst forth from that cloud of smoke that had been appearing on that side of the battlefield just outside of the water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I used some movement to land. Do I have any movement left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your walking movement, yes. You still have 40 feet left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'd like to go...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to go around to the back of this wall back here. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll cast Sanctuary on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action? Okay. Sanctuary on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, really? Balls, wanker, ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends Taryon's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still in my sphere, everyone. Don't come find me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard Grog yell "empty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I did it loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, just in time for all the braziers to go (puff, fiery explosion). I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, it's the other ones before the braziers. Shit, ass, nipples. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? You take four points of fire damage, reduced to two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know where Grog is. I'm going to step over and attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you head over to the edge, glance down, and you see the flames rescind from the brazier, and there Grog is patting the side of his arm. The flames are on his shoulders, but he's putting it out on his elbow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounds right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to attack me over the giant red dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm under the acid, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. 12 plus two lightning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So six and one. Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the second one definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is getting close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 plus one lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And for my bonus action, I'm going to-- oh god. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he can get up to me. I'm going to get on my broom and I'm going to fly up! I'm going to fly into the air for my movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spent ten movement moving up to the side there. You get on your broom, so you get up to about... we'll say, for the purposes of this, you can't get too high up here. You get about there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to fly away from Grog. No, towards the other brazier. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get about there. A little bit over to this side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: About 15 feet up, you said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god! You know what? Ooh, this could be real bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you're doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope. I'm not. I'm thinking about it. I'm going to fly. I'm going to be up, but I'm going to stay over the roof. This is still stupid. I'm going to die. Grog's going to kill me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you're up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But further over towards-- I want to hover over the roof, but towards the other brazier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. About here. I'm just putting you-- fine, I'll move it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. I got confused, Matt. I thought that's where you were saying I was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Roughly, that's where you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a lot to coordinate. That ends your turn, Vex. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to leave you alone. I was going to leave you alone! Fucking dragon sitting in a big-ass pool of acid. Piece of shit! And then the spiral's going to go off. Fuck it. I'm going to-- yeehaw howdy. Can I go to the rope ladder? How much does that take, to get to the rope ladder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wood ladder here? That is five, ten, 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15. Can I use my Boots of Feral Leaping to jump 15 feet vertically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all I need. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get halfway up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my movement to climb up onto the turret and move to the far end?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You get up to right about there, and you have ten more feet. This way? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it hits me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's the damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a million. That's 34 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, 34 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you took another four points of fire damage, reduced to two, from the fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the damage is 24.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Last one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh dear lord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the hammer keeps coming back, and he throws it again? Oh, wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (throwing noises) It's nasty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 25.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! I think my math is wrong. Hold on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did it right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, that doesn't make sense. 25, you say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stayed over the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still take a point of bludgeoning damage, which is an immediate failed save, so you've lost one death save and you're unconscious there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you're trapped up here with me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll go easy on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sure. Kill me quickly so I can go pee, because I've had to for an hour now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your turn, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Keyleth. You don't know where anybody is. You're in acid water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I poke my head out. Do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bunch of smoke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this perspective? Not really. You do see Vex go (thud).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. I've got a good idea. I'm going to fly up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far up are you going to fly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How high is the tower? (stutters)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 35 feet to the top. 35 feet to the top edge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got a flying speed of 80 feet, so I'm going to go 40 feet up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Vex unconscious on the ground there, bleeding out of the side of the mouth, and you see a giant Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On fire, with the hammer pulling back. Grog, you look over your shoulder and you see a big black dragon (whoosh).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at him and I say in Draconic, because I always forget. I go, Grog, check it out! Grog, look!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon goes (guttural growling speech).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to be like, sorry, but I've always wanted to do this. (vomit noises) And do an acid breath. 60-foot line, five-foot wide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're trashed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fire elemental, back to Keyleth, into a dragon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, you guys focused on each other for most of this fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, Grog.
