lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you, sir. May I have another? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not succeed. Keyleth, I need you to roll your 12d8 acid damage that Grog's about to take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, are you immune to acid damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nor resistant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll roll five and then I'll roll five more. Actually, give me one more and I'll roll twice. Get that out of there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And ones you reroll, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cackles)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 32, plus another 14, which is going to be 46, plus three, which is 49, plus another six, which is 55, plus another eight and another seven. 55 plus--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 70, total. Acid damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (guttural growling) There's a stream of acid that sprays down the tower over you, Grog. Go ahead and make your constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tary versus a dragon. This is Dragon Slayer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the acid sprays over Grog, Grog still stands there, covered in acid and looks at you. It puts out the fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have one hit point left, or some shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barbarians have an ability where when they go to zero hit points, they make a constitution saving throw to resist going to zero.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is he at, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he's still standing as the acid is (sizzling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But the fire's out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fire's out, which is ironic because that means at the top of your turn you could have theoretically died. With the remainder of my movement--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Hunter's Mark is gone now. You have your movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have more movement. Can I go, oh fuck! in Draconic and go (boop) right back underneath the acid?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She basically pooped. That's what it sounded like she did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much movement do you have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an 80 fly speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that end your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't have anything fighting against three-quarters cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'll be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch this dragon fly up, spray acid onto the tower, and then disappear into the water below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of curiosity, where and in what condition is Percival's dead body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't seen him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Not even when I was in the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you were in the sky, you saw what looked like a mess in really nice clothing, so you saw Percival. The head was pumpkined. It was bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you checking on the state of Percy's brain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might need to use it. Can I poke out this corner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that getting closer to the dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, here's the thing real fast. Let me read this. Frightful presence. You repeat at the end of its turn. Make another roll for the end of your last turn I forgot to make you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a two again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't quite move closer to it, and that would be considered closer, so you'd have to go around this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the door to the thing? It's right there on the front, right? The door to the tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door to the tower is right there, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's away from the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use my movement to go there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you still invisible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get there. You see the dragon as you rush by. The smoke is still there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I poke around the side of the smoke.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like a Florida alligator right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move past the smoke and the pillar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a quick little Prismatic Spray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Forgot that. All right, so roll a d8.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. Four again. It's the same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll a dexterity saving throw, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. I think that's the exact same thing I rolled last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's another 10d6 poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we call it the same?

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like to roll this many things!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're actually very fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two, four, six, eight, nine, and you have one. There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 points of fire damage to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 35 points of poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poison damage, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm enjoying being the rules Nazi here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil. Don't fuck me. That's good. That's even better. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. You maintain your concentration. Okay, and?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going into the tower. I have a bunch of movement left, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go into the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your boots and the potion, so your movement is 160?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 120. Yeah, you can go anywhere in that tower if you wanted to. There's this floor, there's the second floor, there's a third floor, and then there's the hatch through the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, there's floors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go into the second floor, that has those little...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the little slit windows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Is there any that can see the dragon, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, that's just there, so you can fit up into here, and you don't technically see the dragon from that. You can glance over to the side of here and poke your head through the stairs and look and be like (whimpers).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And also Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And also Sanctuary. One more. Sanctuary's not there, since you used Prismatic Spray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, come on, that would've been the absolute best thing to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just hide and be extremely inconvenient to Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is a strategy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're called a dirty camper. A camper! Like someone who camps in first-person shooters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's me. That's exactly me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so make a wisdom saving throw to see if you can resist the frightened effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Minus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still like, "Oh god, dragon!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn, I wish my thing wasn't busted. I would put him in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, top of the round. The pillars once again (vibration) and begin to affect this area around these pillars, beginning to call gravity to the ground. All righty. That brings us to... Vex, roll a death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay. Grog, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Standing there, with one hit point, acid melting my flesh, I would like to pull out the Deck of Many Things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you dick! You dick! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has the actual, Matt!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can check it, if it's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I'll have to pare down the deck, since we don't have the full deck here. It's a half deck. Where did you get this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's... It was a gift from a fan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. I'm going to do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Critters, for all the cool, useful stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I also have to name a number of cards that I would like to pull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is very true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sad I'm dead right now. This would've been worth everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may not be in a moment! Who knows?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so starting from here, we have...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you. This is the end of Cabin in the Woods. I'm so impressed. Lighting a cigarette at the end of the world.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's not a ton that could help me, but fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks for your patience, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, take your sweet time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we have in the store right now, Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we have t-shirts...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do they say on them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have Gilmore's Glorious Goods, we have Vox Machina t-shirts, we have How Do You Want to Do This? t-shirts...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like people should go to the store and get stuff now, because when the 100th episode runs around, some of those items might be dropped from the store and replaced with new stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You never know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, actually. I literally don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He literally has no idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not like we've been planning for a 100th episode or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if you want these items, you got to get them now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should totally do that. We should plan something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should. When is the 100th?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in a couple weeks, right? Is that enough time to plan anything? Two weeks from now? We could throw something together, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get a cake from Porto's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog. How many cards do you want to pull?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five cards?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggling) Five? Five cards?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! Do it, I'm so proud of you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's chaos, and you're not even going to be here to deal with it! I'm in a house with this stuff! It's going to be me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary versus many horrible things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No good, really bad day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's going to be a grim reaper that comes out and kills Grog immediately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to pick one for me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I? Okay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god. Choose the form of your destroyer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, keep it face-down when you pick it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Five cards. Here, you guys got to pick, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I get four, you get one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One, two...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep track of the order. The final one there. Okay, so Vex is the last one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're never going to get that far.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog, first card. What did you pull?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ruin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: End of game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is Ruin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The picture is a cliff exploding and a body flying off to his death.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's literally what's about to happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Weirdly, not much happens to you that you notice in the moment. At all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I know how Ruin works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Bag of Holding's fucking empty now, and all of your non-magical items are gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're just poor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of your personal wealth is gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about his weapons and all of this shit, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magical items are not affected. It's non-magical. You're no longer a Grand Poobah in this temporary alternate universe. So that probably was one of the better cards you could've pulled. What's the second card, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rogue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An individual standing in front of a devil with five swords going through his torso.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so no discernible effect at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that one do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I'll say for the hell of it: Should you survive this battle, it's going to be really rough one day to have Wilhand stab you in your sleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it turns somebody against you? All right. Third card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you're sitting there, and you're resting one night, Wilhand's like (growls).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I survive this, and I'm acid-melted and laying there dying, and he walks up with a little butter knife, I'll be like, do it! Just do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Third card.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Star.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it looks good. It looks like a good one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which, it seems to be the opposite of what's been happening, so maybe I'm fucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Increase one of your ability scores by two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! Life score! Kill dragon score! Health score?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Intelligence!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can increase your constitution by two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so your hit points now go up by 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have 18 hit points now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because it automatically increases his modifier by one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fourth card?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Key.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this a good one, too? It looks good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the one I thought you had pulled originally. A rare or rarer magical item.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you get a cool thing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope I've cursed him! Please let me have cursed him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want the one that lets me succeed on my next venture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to roll randomly for this real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one automatically succeeds at something? Bring it, bitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should've just picked seven. I picked five; that was good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five is a lot. Five is as high as you can count.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. That's how many fingers you have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the highest number you really know. Everything is just more fives.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog lives in intervals of fives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A beautiful black and ivory-inlaid sword shows up, a greatsword shows up in your hand. You have to attune to it, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. I got 30 minutes to waste. Just sitting here melting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then, what's the next card?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, this looks good, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Knight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggles)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he get a wish?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he get something stupid? He's going to the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get a horse or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog becomes cavalry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please be on top of the tower on a horse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at the card for a second like, "Huh, what does this do?" And you hear a voice go (clears throat). You look to your side, and there is a gentleman with armor and weapons who goes, "Sir Grog! I am here to serve you! Whatever you need, let me know! My life for Strongjaw!" (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any health potions on you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, goodness, sir! Are you all right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dragon?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, dragon. Your courage is most important at this dire hour!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have a 4th-level fighter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 4th-level!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. However, he's the same race as you, so he's a goliath in full armor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! Sweet. Hold on, come here, I need to draw some tattoos on you to make you look like me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The streak continues with Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody's alive. That's my turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were any of those draw again cards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to go down the trapdoor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What about your friend?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, with the friend. No! He's going to stand up there. Just double birds. Out going like this. And he has to go, "I am Grog!" The whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far down do you go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go down to the second level and as you crawl down, you look and you see Taryon there, looking out a window, looking very scared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's your skin?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shrieks) No! It bounces off my Sanctuary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You re-cast Sanctuary on yourself, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's your turn, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to come back out of the acid. (war cry) What do I see? I look towards where Grog was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and you see a goliath in full armor just going...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (war cry) I'm going to fly over, and I'm going to land on top of the tower, and I'm going to do a multiattack against him. (heavy impacts) And frightful presence. I don't know if that affects an imaginary knight from a deck of cards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does! Go ahead and roll a wisdom saving throw for the knight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jeez. He's like, "Dragon! Where--" (screams) As you land next to him, he's like (weak chuckle)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Poor bastard. Into creation for, what, 30 seconds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So full multiattack on this guy, you said, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, bite and two claws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Roll some attacks here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a natural 19 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that'll hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that's 30. Not so good on the second one. That's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 15 does not hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then on the third, that's a seven plus 11, so 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 does hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, two attacks hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So one bite and one claw, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, why does this keep happening to me? Okay, 11 plus seven is 18. Wait, let me make sure I'm doing this right. No, plus six. 11 plus six, so 17, and then 1d8. Four. Okay, so he takes 18-- wait, what did I just say? 17 piercing damage, and then four acid damage from the bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 21 total. And then your next strike, the claw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight plus six is 12. 12 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 damage. As you strike him (heavy impacts), he's like (whimpers) and he's still alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I take the rest of my movement to fly and hover above?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you hover above, we'll say with your full movement, you don't get too far, unfortunately, because you took, to get into that space up there, would've been 70.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I get out of the sphere of the electrical attack? Then no, I'll just stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You stay there. Go ahead and roll an attack for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he get a retaliation attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, if you're not moving, he doesn't. You're right. Never mind. All right, so bringing it back to Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never thought it would come to this. I hold up a diamond, and I point it at your face, and I say, I will heal you if you swear you will not stab me in the back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I swear. I want this dragon dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight check!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty lousy. 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I swear. Yes. Giant dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Healing draught. 9d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead. You have to drink it on your turn, but he hands it to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't use my action to pour it down his throat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can. You walk up to Grog, and (cork pop).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me these things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 9d8! And who rolls them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's another question, when was the last time you hit something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have persistent rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can maintain his rage as long as he wants. High-level barbarians, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will live... to regret this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there can be only one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 54? No, 64. 64 health, I think you're at.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at 64, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. You can move, Taryon, if you want to, or do you want to stay put?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll for fear again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, at the end of your turn, you do. At the end of your turn, though. If you're going to move, move first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will move down to the bottom floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you get down to the bottom floor, and you're right by the doors, which are now burned down entirely. The wood has caught fire and crumbled in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still have some movement, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have a shit-ton of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look up to see if I can see the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the edge of a wing going (whoosh).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A wing. I'm going to go to the north bunker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? Okay. With that, Taryon, you head down through here and into this north bunker over here. All right. Grog, you're technically in that room there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. And now I roll my fear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, now you roll your fear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 16? 15. What do I have to roll to beat this thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you didn't roll high enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, I think it is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, I'm never going to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only lasts a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Taryon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arcane towers (crackling) send out a burst of energy. Roll a dexterity saving throw for your knight friend, and you roll, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's not that great. I thought that was better. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? He succeeds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be 16 lightning damage. Instead, he takes eight. I'll mark that here. He's hurt pretty bad, but he's still hanging in there. What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. So you take 16 points of lightning damage. Go ahead and roll a constitution check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot. I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a failed death save for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And... yeah. How many have you lost now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's two fails.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's your turn. Go ahead and roll again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right. One!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, we'll say from a narrative standpoint, as the lightning sparks out and it hits Keyleth in her dragon form, she falls back and her back foot (squelch) accidentally smears Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's going to be hard to clean up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No fate dice for us, Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pull out the rest of the-- no, I run up to the top of the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's immune to fear because barbarian and raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ain't scared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He ain't scared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's absurd. And then she has all of her hit points left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Grog, you get up to the top of the hatch and you come out and you're right there next to your goliath friend, in the face of this big dragon. What are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to rush up to the giant red dragon and go: Yo, Wilfred. This is how it's done, lad. And I do all three attacks, reckless, at the fucking dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reckless? You could kill the dragon in one move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think so. That's a 32?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To hit? Yeah. He could take me down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 on the first one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before you roll damage on the next one, roll another constitution saving throw for concentration. Beat a 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've had a few of those tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so that was a nine, so 25. That was nine on the die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a nine on the die. This is the damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 18, plus your modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus two additional dice for the weapon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 47 points of damage to you. Roll another constitution saving throw. You have to beat a 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As long as I roll over--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, constitution?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not wisdom. It's constitution for these.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you been adding your wisdom modifier this whole time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My constitution's all right. I've been rolling over the minimum, anyway. No. Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth's form drops.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell drops, losing concentration. Her form reverts into regular Keyleth again. It wasn't damage over. There's Keyleth in front of you. You still have your third attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I definitely think about kicking her off the top of the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So many menu options.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits. 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why were you like, ugh? You wanted a critical?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't be greedy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. 27.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damage total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 damage to you, and your friend next to you, who's no longer frightened because you're no longer a dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't get to attack, does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he does. He attacks on your turn. He gets two attacks with his greatsword. Go ahead and attack twice for him. Plus five to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus five to hit. That's a 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so 2d6 plus three to each hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the honor of Strongjaw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll protect you, my lord!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten, one. You said 2d6 plus one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6 plus three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so that's 13 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six, seven. Ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So 23 total.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: 23 total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he was going to be in and out in a quick Pop Tart flash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ends your turn, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three attacks, bonus action. Can't do anything. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up. Form has dropped. Grog is looking healthier than you remember him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog. We're friends, right? Remember me? Come here. I'm going to grab him real quick and I'm going to do Plane Shift.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus one.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll on the dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The 20 is what I had.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's what he rolled!

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your 7th-level spell, gone.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: take my bonus action to go oh, Grog! And cast a Grasping Vine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasping Vine is 4th-level. You can't cast it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Okay. I will do... options are dwindling very quickly.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. You're right. 2nd-level Healing Word. So it's 2d4. Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't believe you made that fucking roll!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My charisma's plus one.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Land safely?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Parkour.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, for me. Buddy, first. That's a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d6 plus three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just six? Six from the knight. Okay, that puts me at 46.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 28 to hit from me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's okay.

lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so bad at my athletics. I'm always so bad! 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll get a decent distance, but your jump distance is tripled because of your mantle, so you do manage to make it and land on that roof. You take four points of bludgeoning damage. I rolled one, one, two.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Halfway up? About there.

lines.text: Cone? It's a cone outward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're dealing with three dimensions, here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could hit both of them. All three of them with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will aim that way.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even though I'm down from them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 60-feet distance, 60-foot cone. I don't know if the math is going to work. If not, I have a backup plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're all within 60 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary wins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d8 again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Prismatic Spray. Yeah, d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a different one. This is a five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six, but I have resistance to cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am at 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you succeed. So half damage to both of you. Roll that now. It's 10d6 cold damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten cubes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That saving throw may be the only thing that saves me. Maybe. Depends on how he rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll see how the roll goes. This is close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. Oh. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 36, halved. 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She says, before she dies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut your dirty mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do one more Sanctuary, and I'm going to stay up. Can I fly back down? That probably took all my speed. Yeah, I'll hover in place.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Okay, that just succeeds. You take half damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I have resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. I rolled pretty good, so it was 21 points of lightning damage, reduced to ten, and then halved because you have resistance, so five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Grog, it's your turn. You have Keyleth over here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I only have one target. I stride confidently to the edge of the tower, and I'd like to use my Boots of Feral Leaping to jump and bring my hammer down on top of Keyleth, on top of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't be a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, don't be a one. That's pretty good. That's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, reduced to three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Twice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had you twice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, I smash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Time for a beautiful and glorious death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He got another 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the first hit? Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a nine, so 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I almost teleported his fucking ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's six places he should have died.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's not rush it. 43. 51.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth-- you take the three damage not from the stone breaking your fall, but from her breaking your fall as you land on her. She (thud) onto the stone, flat on the ground, the hammer placed squarely between the back of her shoulderblades, in the middle of the neck. As you bring the hammer back up, pulling it back, she's twitching a little on the stonework, but she's still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach down. I grab one of those jacked-up antlers, hold her up in the air. I look at Tary, and I lob it and smack her towards the acid pool. I want to hit her in the air towards the acid pool.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) So cold!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. Yeah, 36?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: Oh, that's depressing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: I got to use the tattoo.

lines.text: One last attack. I look up at Tary and I'm like, you did save me. What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: I like your style. I have a throwing distance. It is ranged, so I think it's at disadvantage, which is 70 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm flying, so I will fly where I saw him hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's immune to everything, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's just resistant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he's resistant to everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So poison, acid he's not resistant to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm resistant to poison.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's not resistant to acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because of your belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll fly over there and I guess I've got to get within 30 feet above him. Or 30 feet of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll chuck acid at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This vial (splash) hits the ground and splashes acid all around you. He has to make a dexterity saving throw, I think?

lines.text: I'll look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? Already?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 is the first one. 18 on the second one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so that's halved?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) I'm like a bird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I climb back up on the roof. I walk over to Tary. How did I break the Sanctuary with Groon? I just booped him, right? Can I reach him with my fingertip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. He's about 15 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to try and hit him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jump and hit or throw and hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throw and hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go (frustrated noise).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stubborn as a mule. 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One more. Ooh! 19?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah. That means it breaks my Sanctuary, yeah. Does he roll again to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll to attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless. I got through, ma! 31.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, (laughs, gong sound). You taste the blood for the first time in your mouth, really.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he stay on the broom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Had to bring him back, didn't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is your fault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the rest of my movement, can I run back down off the roof and into the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to actually fly away further and pull out another gem from my helmet and cast what modern-day people would call napalm. Straight into the door. A Wall of Fire, straight in the door, in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I ain't winning any beauty contests.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A straight wall of flame engulfs the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 5d8 fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ones and twos. Here we go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're resistant, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been burned, melted, burned, melted, and burned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity save from you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dexterity? 21. Plus two on a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26, so you take half that, which is 13, because you succeeded on your save, and then half that. You take six points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it? Weak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's resistant to fire, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn? You still have your bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Sanctuary myself again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it. Sanctuary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far above the roof of that building is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's 30 feet above it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, never mind. I will leap horizontally towards the building that he is close to. 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to move out of the room first. So you have ten feet out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might not have made that. 17. I made it by one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you almost tripped in the acid? That would have been awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because I fall prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn. It would have been so cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So 20 feet horizontally, and then the rest of my speed to run to the building, climb up on the roof, and get right underneath him. I'd like to try and get through this fucking Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that we thought this might go fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I'm still laughing at him saying that at the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack lost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. That gets through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Third and final strike. (grunts)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, just to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, to hit? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Still kicking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite well, I might add.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got a lot. He had a lot of hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really? He ate half of his cloak or whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy is impossible to kill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not impossible, Tary. It's not impossible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Tary, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19. That 19 will haunt me for forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is pulling a patch an action? I'll fly right over the acid pit, right over the center, and I've got to do one more Prismatic Spray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Dexterity check, Grog. Roll a d8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A d8?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolls a d8. What did you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's four. It's poison, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four is poison, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which I have resistance to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so roll 10d6. And he saved, so he takes a quarter of the poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, a quarter?! Goddamn it! This guy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, at any time, you can just plop into the acid and it will all be over. You can drop in, listen to the bubbles consume your flesh. Be like soggy Cracklin' Oat Bran. That milk looks weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 42 halved and quartered. So it's 11? Wait, is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, ten. Ten points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten? Ten?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can't have that much more. Don't give up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me guess. Sanctuary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have many more of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 3rd-level Sanctuary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fucking walk off the roof and toward the edge of the acid and I'm like, okay, in range, and I'll--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you can't cast 3rd-level spells after you've already done a spell. You can only do 2nd-level.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not casting it at a higher level. He's sacrificing a higher-level spell slot to cast a lower-level. It doesn't change anything about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but because I used Prismatic Spray. Oh, I see. It's still a low-level spell. I'm just using a slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just using a higher-level slot. It's not casting at a higher level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what? All right. I just thought if you cast it as a higher-level spell, you couldn't do it as a lower-level spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shenanigans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's basically sacrificing a high-level spell to cast a lower-level spell that doesn't get any benefit from being sacrificed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First wisdom save. Goddamn, the fucking-- 17?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First attack, you get through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He moved right under here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's right under you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm over the acid!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you land in the acid, dude--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he knocks you off your broom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a 37 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he get knocked off his broom? He doesn't have the same things that I have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 on the first hit, for damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we ever built a safety net into his broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but he's not being knocked-- if it was an attack that pushed or did anything to affect his movement or yank him, then it would become an issue. Just doing damage won't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same things that would knock him off the broom would knock you off the broom. It would just mean the broom stays attached to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22. Natural 19. Son of a bitch. A million.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that he's getting so cranky about rolling natural 19s.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 points of damage. I mean, after six rolls, you'd hope so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made a save on each of those rolls?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am so sorry. I thought after I got through the first one it just dispelled it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first one was a 24, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you need to erase--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have to roll saves for the next two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay. I probably won't get through him, though. 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the last two attacks do no damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I live to see another day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry. I thought it dispelled it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or 15 more seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus Christ. I know that he takes acid damage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. He doesn't appear to be resistant to acid damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I will throw acid at him. In the face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two-Face style.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, the acid drop. It's a dex save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dex save on you, Grog, to try and avoid it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Full damage on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This could be it. Oh, this is it. Well, maybe. 29.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, 29 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acid damage, yeah. Roll a constitution.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the plus two to constitution from the card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, plus one. The modifier gives you a plus one. The DC is 15 this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He stays up at one hit point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams) He's insane!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's undead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC's going to be 20, next time that happens. You still have your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go 50 feet anywhere. To the top of that tower over there, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Can I get there? Or as far away from him as I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get... all the way over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to get lightninged, but that's okay. I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's better than a Grogning. All right, that ends your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're on top of the fucking tower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm in there. 23. Where are you going, chicken? With my 50 feet of speed-- is there a chain hanging from the front of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I climb that with 50 feet of speed? Probably not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can climb it. We'll see how far you can get.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'm going to run into the tower and start running up the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll get partway into the first floor on your 50. Are you going to dash to try and do the rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, if it will get me to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It won't get you all the way to the top, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. I'll dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you'll get-- with your dash, into the third floor, almost to the hatch. So you're up in the third floor right now. Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (giggles) I casually walk down the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come to the hatch, and Grog rushes up into the third floor there. As you come down in the hatch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my hands?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a simple man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I can do that. (laughing) I can't do that. You're so powerful. I'll probably miss!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I miss, then I'm trapped in a room with him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got one hit point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I could miss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him, Tary!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is your chance to claim your bravery for your house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greatsword!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're getting him with a greatsword?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I've got. Greatsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your rod turns into a greatsword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) The fucking thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do this crazy around and around thing and try to do that with the greatsword. Oh, and can I set it on fire, first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I rolling? What was that? 12 plus eight plus two magic. That's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a constitution--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a constitution saving throw. DC 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a natural 19.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, he's still fucking alive!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'd like to take my retaliation strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still have movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, after this. Retaliation is an immediate reaction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get a disengage. Didn't we go over this? I did a melee weapon attack. Don't I get a disengage for free?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your feat, you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! My Mobile feat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but this isn't him getting a free attack from you moving away. One of his barbarian abilities is if someone hits him with a melee attack, he can immediately attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goaded you right into doing what he wanted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points do you have?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Enough.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your attack, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless. Come on, natural 20. No. 27.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To hit? Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hurts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But not enough.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It hurts you, because I have a Shield of Fire that burns anybody who attacks me with a melee attack. With 2d8 cold damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This fucking magic is too much for this barbarian. I mean, goddamn. People are turning into flames, dragons, running around in a fucking hamster ball, setting me on fucking cold damage...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll some cold damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another constitution check with a DC 25, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: DC 25!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has to roll a natural 20 in order to get this. No. He has to roll a 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He gets two rolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have plus 12 as the modifier to the roll. My constitution is plus 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, a saving throw? Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I have to roll-- what's the math on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17 or higher?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not even that much. It's a 13 or higher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to make it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want him to hit the blazing TD on my chest and have the might of my name ricochet back with the power of energy. The Darrington name strikes him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cold shatters you, and you feel the ribcage break like brittle glass on the inside of your chest from the blast backward. You fall to your knees, unable to move a muscle. You can feel the life barely beating through. Your body is heaving with each heartbeat pulse. He's prostrate before you, Taryon, as you approach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say, Doty, take this down. I win. And I kick him over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got your fate dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. And your parents are named after Tony Stark's parents. How crazy is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. They are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hit points did you have left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still had 30 or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He had 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm curious. Where were you going to try and Plane Shift Grog?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Water Plane. Water dimension. You would have just drowned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know your charisma was-- I thought you had zero.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's plus one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why I was like, ugh, it's a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. That was awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a great battle, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a great map! That map was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm glad you guys had fun. I was hoping it would be fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The three different varying--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was like a paintball field.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little bunker areas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did have places that people that were flying could hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we had tried to hit one of the spires that created electricity, would that have ended that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here? You could have destroyed it. Hitting it would have done damage to it, but it would have prevented that from going off in that area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were all the trunks the same thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, each trunk had one healing potion. It was whoever got there first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there was one trunk left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One trunk left that nobody went to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one that I was in for a lot of the time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kept thinking about telling you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really? The one down here in the lower left?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, bottom left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was the one I was camping out in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it wasn't my turn, so I didn't say anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I almost thought about taking it just so no one else could have it, but never got to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (giggles) That was nuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should be fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Level 20 Keyleth is nasty. I get unlimited Shapechange.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, is nasty? You are nasty! You were like the fucking Conclave. Jesus. The only thing you didn't turn into was a giant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I was going to take the light down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had a 90% chance of just disappearing and drowning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I thought that's what he was going to fucking do. I can't believe that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would have bamfed, and then it would have been down to Tary and I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had no idea you could break out of my fucking necklace!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nobody tried.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's so many ways that you could have died tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you could have died 80 times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that glove had worked, I would have had an action surge and five shots to the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the balance to the necklace so you can't just imprison the main big bad guy of something and be like, "Oh, that's over because he rolled poor." It will help for a while, but if he stays in there for a long time and he's intelligent, he'll eventually find a way out. It's an imperfect prison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a wicker basket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the Deck, yet again, didn't harm me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you don't know that because it was all a dream in Tary's fucking head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You pulling that knight probably changed things because he did just enough damage to me to make it a pain in the ass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That plus two to modifier? There's a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cards were amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to hold onto those, if that's okay. I want to use those from now on. Oh, that was so much fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Came in the mail a little while ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Taryon Darrington, champion of the battle royale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two clerics and an artificer are our reigning champions in the battles, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two clerics?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kashaw won the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, Kash. And I was the runner-up with Pike, too! Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then Pike pushed your face into lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wasn't the runner-up tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I went down hard, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did go down hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got hammered to death so soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again, if the glove had worked, it would have been amazing. That would have been an ugly, terrible death for Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had some bad rolls. You, more so than anybody in this party-- maybe Grog, but Grog had to still get there-- you, with an action surge and some good rolls, you can pretty much take down almost any member in one round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With good rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With good rolls.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You jammed all of your guns. I can't believe you jammed all of your guns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not only that, but the gun that does damage when it jams jammed twice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of your war paint is gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, it's gone. Did you go wash your face?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's just been wiping his face the whole night. It's all over his hands, probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Show us your hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your sheets tonight are going to be nasty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be hard to see in the forest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hope you guys enjoyed watching. We'll see you guys next week to pick up the next leg of the adventure, as we left off right as you were exiting the platinum mines with the swarm of ankhegs below you. We'll pick up from there next week. We'll have Jon Heder as a guest, which I got to coordinate with him to get his story stuff figured out. We'll talk. And the week after that will be our 100th episode. That's fucking crazy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, how?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, some of them weren't that good. So really only 60.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think 20th episode, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what matters. So looking forward to that. We should have some fun surprises on the 100th episode. We're excited about that. Anyway, much love to you guys. Have a wonderful night, and is it Thursday yet? See you soon.
